data.what_is: Marketing optimization software for marketing managers that are focused on generating targeted leads and improving sales team performance. Marketing Optimizer empowers digital marketers with the tools and reporting to continually improve their lead generation campaigns.
data.product_description: Marketing optimization software for marketing managers that are focused on generating targeted leads and improving sales team performance. Marketing Optimizer empowers digital marketers with the tools and reporting to continually improve their lead generation campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: A Great platform to Manage Leads in Right Way!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Optimizer?
Its east to genrate leads but managing all clients and touch each and single client always been a tough for us thats why we used marketing optimizer for our company and its work reallly best to touch each point of client by email or sms. Its work really best.

What do you dislike about Marketing Optimizer?
We used this tool for a very long period of time and didn't find anything not working so we didn't dislike anything on this point.

What problems is Marketing Optimizer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Once the lead genrate its very important for us to touch clients by email or any other way to build bridge between our relation with the client. We solve this problem by this platform and its work really amazing to complete all our requirements from analysis our leads quality to retain new customer.

Our new clients also like this alot.

initial_reviews.review_title: Lead Management Works Really Well! Loved this feature
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketing Optimizer?
We were despirately looking for a lead management software for our company and that's where we found marketing optimizer which cover lead management to email tracking everything that's what we like the best in this software.

What do you dislike about Marketing Optimizer?
We are using this software from a very long time and completely into lead management that's what I can say that is nothing wrong with lead management tool and you may go ahead of you are looking for something like this.

What problems is Marketing Optimizer solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our team facing huge problem while getting leads from different source of information and communication technology. We decide to go with the help of this software to manage all leads in single platforms with compelete tracking features.
